A rock that can be created when an [[Classes:FireDemon|afrit]] unrolls from its protective ball. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR FireDemonRock5 : {{Class|FireDemonRock1}} { States { Spawn: FDMN W 4 Loop Death: FDMN W 5 [[A_SmBounce]] XDeath: FDMN W 200 Stop } }
